title: Republican States & Counties Are Not Safe from the Leftâ€™s Destruction | Guests: Sen. Mike Lee & Carol Roth | 6/14/22
description:
Sen. Mike Lee discusses the latest SCOTUS opinions released, the opinions to come later this week, and the recent bipartisan gun control bill. Glenn reads a story from the Atlantic that highlights the dangers and horrors of fentanyl. Glenn tells the story of an elected official in a Republican Utah county, proving that not even Republican counties are safe from the repercussions of the Left's destructive policies. Former investment banker Carol Roth debunks the claim that oil companies and greed are to blame for the high gas prices. Glenn dives deeper into the Google AI "LaMDA" that some reports claim has become sentient. Glenn and Stu discuss House Speaker Nancy Pelosi appearing on "RuPaul's Drag Race" to push people to vote.
